items.title: As secondhand luxury soars, authentication becomes a new gold standard
items.description: Secondhand fashion and luxury is gaining ground fast, with the global resale market expected to hit up to $360 billion by 2030 from about $210 billion...

items.title: How the world’s 240,000 crypto millionaires are spending their fortunes
items.description: There are now an estimated 241,700 individuals with crypto holdings worth $1 million or more, up 40% from last year, according to new data.
